question: Which of the following hosts the "National Centre for Clean Coal Research and Development (NCCCR&D)" which was inaugurated by the Union Minister of Science & Technology Dr Harsh Vardhan in Bengaluru on September 16, 2019?
option2: Jawaharlal Nehru Centre For Advanced Scientific Research
explanation: Indian Institute of Science-Bengaluru hosts the "National Centre for Clean Coal Research and Development (NCCCR&D)" which was inaugurated by the Union Minister of Science & Technology Dr Harsh Vardhan on September 16, 2019. NCCCR&D is a national consortium on clean coal research and development led by the Indian Institute of Science with IIT- Kharagpur, Madras, Guwahati, Bombay, and Hyderabad as partners.
